0.1.2-alpha.title: LWNAP alpha

0.2.0.description:
This is the first release for the new apworld of Little Witch Nobeta AP to use with the new MelonLoader client mod.

From now on the game client mod and the apworld will have seperate releases. For the client mod look [here](https://github.com/danielgruethling/LittleWitchNobetaAP/releases).

For a setup guide look [here](https://github.com/danielgruethling/Archipelago/blob/game_lwn/worlds/little_witch_nobeta/docs/setup_en.md). The links to the player options there only work when you run the web host yourself. Generate a template yaml using the launcher option and set your personal options from there.

Logic is now partially generated from this repo: https://github.com/danielgruethling/NobetaLogic
When you want to PR logic fixes and they go into rules.py, regions.py or locations.py, please PR them there.
0.2.0.title: Little Witch Nobeta apworld 0.2.0-beta

0.2.1.description:
This is version 0.2.1-beta for the new apworld of Little Witch Nobeta AP to use with the new MelonLoader client mod.

0.2.1 changes:
- removed logic requirement for wind in underground start to work around a soft lock
  - game client mod will give the statue there on scene load in a later version. for now there will be a need to perform a [trick jump](https://youtu.be/00QJZCyoTHQ?t=7070) or start with wind
- fixed a bug where defeating Tania would not give the location
- moved the arcane that is started with to start inventory unless no_arcane is on

From now on the game client mod and the apworld will have seperate releases. For the client mod look [here](https://github.com/danielgruethling/LittleWitchNobetaAP/releases).

For a setup guide look [here](https://github.com/danielgruethling/Archipelago/blob/game_lwn/worlds/little_witch_nobeta/docs/setup_en.md). The links to the player options there only work when you run the web host yourself. Generate a template yaml using the launcher option and set your personal options from there.

Logic is now partially generated from this repo: https://github.com/danielgruethling/NobetaLogic
When you want to PR logic fixes and they go into rules.py, regions.py or locations.py, please PR them there.
0.2.1.title: Little Witch Nobeta apworld 0.2.1-beta
